decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal complies with Class B.1 (d) (i) (the cubic content of the resulting roof space would exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more than - (i) 40 cubic metres in the case of a terrace house, or (ii) 50 cubic metres in any other cases) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal complies with condition Class B.2 (b) (ii) (the enlargement which joins the original roof to the roof of a rear or side extension, no part of the enlargement extends beyond the outside face of any external wall of the original dwellinghouse) of Class B, Part 1,Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
